definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: No end to disputes in local arts circles?
sentences.chinese: 本地藝術界爲何風波不斷？

sentences.english: Pakistan will be messy, but stable after this fashion, in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦將迎來風波不斷，但至少平穩的2010年。
